title: [Massive] Enhancing Financial Accounting Comprehension Through Integrated Graph Texts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting terminology and understanding of financial statement components
context.additional_context: Conducting interactive learning using real-time graph-text integrated materials via digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately interpret key items of financial statements (e.g., budget, income statement) with integrated graphs and text at an accuracy rate of over 80%.
Learners can verbally present core information extracted from financial data visualizations within five minutes.
Learners can explain complex financial statuses using a three-step process by leveraging the interconnection of graphs and text during financial statement analysis.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
